app.name: Secure Attachments app
app.description: This app warns you when attachments with a certain file extension exist.

whitelist.label: Whitelist
whitelist.helpText: Define the file formats for attachments that agents and users are allowed to upload. (Separate extensions with a comma. For example: zip, jpg, gif, png, pdf)

alert.empty_whitelist: You have not specified a whitelist. All attachments in a ticket will be considered dangerous.

unsecure.heading: Potentially malicious attachments detected
unsecure.body: We have found one or more attachments in this ticket that could be used to spread malware.
